Html:
I recompiled tsc.js, typescript.js, typescriptservices.js and overritten the ones in the typescript install folder. Restarted vs2012, yet my changes are not propagated.

Is the LanguageService dll using typescript from embedded/hardcoded resources?

I have managed to patch TypeScriptLanguageService at runtime, using another custom vspackage. Ugly but effective.

Please consider in the next version to give the oportunity to change language service compiler more easily...
